name: Friendly Fortitude
description:
My, this adventurer sure is dumb.

We can probably help them out! Try grabbing a few things and see if you can move them around in a way that helps this adventurer delve deeper into this fort.

--------

This game was created for:

Minijam 101 : Limit - Control The Environment
